DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial ass efficacy 0416 Ointment Treatment Atopic Dermatitis . Treatment medication administer follow : Apply thin layer ointment affect skin area twice daily rub gently completely . Study medication apply twice day , approximately 12 hour apart , approximately 2 week .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Atopic Dermatitis Good health exception Atopic Dermatitis Percent Body Surface Area minimum requirement Subjects pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy within study participation period . Subjects systemic dermatological disorder exception Atopic Dermatitis
